69         # Lua script for atomic token bucket operations
70         self._token_bucket_script = """
71         local key = KEYS[1]
72         local now = tonumber(ARGV[1])
73         local rate = tonumber(ARGV[2])
74         local capacity = tonumber(ARGV[3])
75         local requested = tonumber(ARGV[4])
76 
77         -- Get current bucket state
78         local bucket = redis.call('HMGET', key, 'tokens', 'last_update')
79         local tokens = tonumber(bucket[1] or capacity)
80         local last_update = tonumber(bucket[2] or now)
81 
82         -- Calculate tokens to add since last update
83         local elapsed = now - last_update
84         local new_tokens = elapsed * rate
85         tokens = math.min(capacity, tokens + new_tokens)
86 
87         -- Check if request can be fulfilled
88         if tokens >= requested then
89             -- Consume tokens
90             tokens = tokens - requested
91             redis.call('HMSET', key, 'tokens', tokens, 'last_update', now)
92             redis.call('EXPIRE', key, 86400)  -- Expire after 24 hours of inactivity
93             return 1  -- Allowed
94         else
95             -- Update last_update even if denied (to prevent stale data)
96             redis.call('HMSET', key, 'tokens', tokens, 'last_update', now)
97             redis.call('EXPIRE', key, 86400)
98             return 0  -- Denied
99         end
100         """

results.issue_text:
Possible hardcoded password: '
        local key = KEYS[1]
        local now = tonumber(ARGV[1])
        local rate = tonumber(ARGV[2])
        local capacity = tonumber(ARGV[3])
        local requested = tonumber(ARGV[4])

        -- Get current bucket state
        local bucket = redis.call('HMGET', key, 'tokens', 'last_update')
        local tokens = tonumber(bucket[1] or capacity)
        local last_update = tonumber(bucket[2] or now)

        -- Calculate tokens to add since last update
        local elapsed = now - last_update
        local new_tokens = elapsed * rate
        tokens = math.min(capacity, tokens + new_tokens)

        -- Check if request can be fulfilled
        if tokens >= requested then
            -- Consume tokens
            tokens = tokens - requested
            redis.call('HMSET', key, 'tokens', tokens, 'last_update', now)
            redis.call('EXPIRE', key, 86400)  -- Expire after 24 hours of inactivity
            return 1  -- Allowed
        else
            -- Update last_update even if denied (to prevent stale data)
            redis.call('HMSET', key, 'tokens', tokens, 'last_update', now)
            redis.call('EXPIRE', key, 86400)
            return 0  -- Denied
        end
        '
